meanings.sent1: The planarias in the pond are flatworms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study planarias to learn more about flatworms.
meanings.sent3: The planarias had a race to see who could slither the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flatworms, planarias are the kings of agility.
meanings.sent5: The planarias wriggled gracefully through the water, captivating onlookers.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the planarias crawling on the rock!
meanings.sent2: The planarias in the tank seem to be multiplying.
meanings.sent3: The planarias gathered for a meeting to discuss their next move.
meanings.sent4: The jar was filled with planarias, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent5: The planarias wiggled together in harmony, a sight to behold.
